issue.title: [CI][C++][Gandiva] Fix gandiva nightly linux build failure
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12039](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12039). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ganidva nightly linux build has recently been failing for sometime with the message "Error:  Failed to execute goal on project arrow-orc: Could not resolve dependencies for project org.apache.arrow.orc:arrow-orc:jar:4.0.0-SNAPSHOT: Could not find artifact jdk.tools:jdk.tools:jar:1.6 at specified path /usr/lib/jvm/adoptopenjdk-11-hotspot-amd64/../lib/tools.jar"
